languages.text: "С благоговением сообщаю, что ваше {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}своевременное вмешательство{/d} и стойкость защитников мира позволили переломить хребет рейду, грозившему превратиться в затяжную войну. Даргонус понес потери, однако мощностей улья хватит для скорейшего восстановления административных сетей и производств. Мир остается в строю, невзирая на коварный удар ксеносов".

"It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."
languages.original_text: "С благоговением сообщаю, что ваше {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}своевременное вмешательство{/d} и стойкость защитников мира позволили переломить хребет рейду, грозившему превратиться в затяжную войну. Даргонус понес потери, однако мощностей улья хватит для скорейшего восстановления административных сетей и производств. Мир остается в строю, невзирая на коварный удар ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you the timely intervention and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid threatening to become a protracted war. Dargonus took losses, but the Hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industry as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

Dargonus took losses, but the Hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industry as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

"It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

languages.text: “我怀着最深的敬畏之情告知您，这个世界的防卫者{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}及时参与战斗{/d}，靠着坚韧不拔的毅力击退了这场本可能会旷日持久的袭击。尽管达戈努斯遭受了一定程度的打击，但巢都依然有足够的能力，可以尽快恢复行政网络与工业生产。虽然那些异形卑鄙地袭击了我们，但这个世界依然几乎完好无损。”
languages.original_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

traits.locale_text: “我怀着最深的敬畏之情告知您，这个世界的防卫者及时参与战斗，靠着坚韧不拔的毅力击退了这场本可能会旷日持久的袭击。尽管达戈努斯遭受了一定程度的打击，但巢都依然有足够的能力，可以尽快恢复行政网络与工业生产。虽然那些异形卑鄙地袭击了我们，但这个世界依然几乎完好无损。”

languages.text: «Debo expresar mi admiración por la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}puntual intervención{/d} y la resistencia con la que los defensores lograron cortar el impulso de la incursión, que amenazaba con convertirse en una guerra prolongada. Dargonus ha sufrido numerosas bajas, pero la capacidad de la colmena le permitirá restaurar las redes administrativas y la industria a máxima velocidad. Pese a haber sufrido un duro golpe a manos de los xenos, el mundo permanece intacto».
languages.original_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Debo expresar mi admiración por la puntual intervención y la resistencia con la que los defensores lograron cortar el impulso de la incursión, que amenazaba con convertirse en una guerra prolongada. Dargonus ha sufrido numerosas bajas, pero la capacidad de la colmena le permitirá restaurar las redes administrativas y la industria a máxima velocidad. Pese a haber sufrido un duro golpe a manos de los xenos, el mundo permanece intacto».

languages.text: "Mit großer Ehrfurcht teile ich Ihnen mit, dass es dem {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}rechtzeitigen Eingreifen{/d} und dem Durchhaltevermögen der Verteidiger der Welt gelungen ist, den Überfall, der sich zu einem langwierigen Krieg auszuweiten drohte, abzuwehren. Dargonus hat Verluste erlitten, aber die Makropole verfügt über ausreichende Kapazitäten, um die Verwaltungsnetze und Industrien so schnell wie möglich wiederherzustellen. Die Welt bleibt trotz des heimtückischen Schlags, den die Xenos ihr zugefügt haben, intakt."
languages.original_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

traits.locale_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the timely intervention and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

languages.text: « C'est avec la plus profonde admiration que je vous informe que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}l'intervention opportune{/d} et la résilience des défenseurs de la planète ont permis de mettre les assaillants en déroute et d'éviter ainsi un conflit prolongé. Dargonus a subi des pertes, mais la ruche dispose des capacités suffisantes pour rétablir les réseaux administratifs et relancer ses industries dans les meilleurs délais. Le monde lui-même demeure intact malgré l'attaque insidieuse des xénos. »
languages.original_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

traits.locale_text: « C'est avec la plus profonde admiration que je vous informe que l'intervention opportune et la résistance des défenseurs de la planète ont permis de mettre les assaillants en déroute et d'éviter ainsi un conflit prolongé. Dargonus a subi des pertes, mais la ruche dispose des capacités suffisantes pour rétablir les réseaux administratifs et relancer ses industries dans les meilleurs délais. Le monde lui-même demeure intact malgré l'attaque insidieuse des xénos. »

languages.text: 「驚くべきことですが、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}タイミングよく介入{/d}できたこと、そして惑星の防衛者たちの粘り強い抵抗によって、持久戦へと発展しかねなかった襲撃の勢いを挫くことに成功しました。ダルゴナスは損害を受けましたが、ハイヴには十分な再建能力があり、行政ネットワークと産業は可能な限り迅速に復旧される見込みです。異種族による陰湿な一撃を受けながらも、惑星そのものは健在にございます。」
languages.original_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「驚くべきことですが、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}タイミングよく介入{/d}できたこと、そして惑星の防衛者たちの粘り強い抵抗によって、持久戦へと発展しかねなかった襲撃の勢いを挫くことに成功しました。ダルゴナスは損害を受けましたが、ハイヴには十分な再建能力があり、行政ネットワークと産業は可能な限り迅速に復旧される見込みです。異種族による陰湿な一撃を受けながらも、惑星そのものは健在にございます。」

languages.text: "Duyduğum hayranlıkla birlikte sizi bilgilendirmek isterim ki {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}zamanında müdahaleniz{/d} ve dünyanın savunucularının dirayeti, çok uzun bir savaşa dönüşme tehlikesi bulunan baskının belini bükmeyi başardı. Dargonus kayıplar vermiş olsa da kovan, yönetim ağlarını ve endüstrileri süratle yeniden faal hâle getirecek kapasiteye sahip. Zenoların sinsi darbesine rağmen dünya sapasağlam ayakta."
languages.original_text: "It is with deepest awe that I inform you that the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}timely intervention{/d} and the resilience of the world's defenders managed to break the back of the raid, which had threatened to turn into a protracted war. Dargonus suffered losses, but the hive has sufficient capacity to restore the administrative networks and industries as expeditiously as possible. The world remains intact despite the insidious blow dealt by the xenos."
